text.english: I have pursued my enemies and overtaken them; Neither did I turn back again till they were destroyed. You have also given me the necks of my enemies, So that I destroyed those who hated me.
text.arabic: أَتْبَعُ أَعْدَائِي فَأُدْرِكُهُمْ وَلاَ أَرْجِعُ حَتَّى أُفْنِيَهُمْ. وَتُعْطِينِي أَقْفِيَةَ أَعْدَائِي وَمُبْغِضِيَّ أُفْنِيهِمْ.
